blogs_value.title: my Third blog
blogs_value.body: it is the time of life to pursue the things that are to be blamed for the pain of a blessed one, nor avoid the pleasures of flattery, nor any further annoyance to reject one's debts
blogs_value.author: Sara

blogs_value.title: my Third blog
blogs_value.body:
to obtain any pleasure by rejecting one's love and often taking care of things is a fault
obody is obliged to know the thing and the pain itself is right
obody wants the pleasure of things
blogs_value.author: Sara
